actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Museum Services Act to increase the authorization of appropriations for the purpose of making grants under such Act.

summary.text: Increases from $15,000,000 to $30,000,000 the authorization of appropriations for the purpose of making grants under the Museum Services Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Museum Services Act to increase the authorization of appropriations for the purpose of making grants under such Act.
